---
title: "Course Schedule - Fall 2025"
subtitle: "Analytics & Computer Science Programs"
format:
  html:
    toc: false
    number-sections: false
    theme: cosmo
    css: |
      .course-table {
        overflow-x: auto;
        margin: 1rem 0;
      }
      .course-table table {
        width: 100%;
        min-width: 1200px;
        border-collapse: collapse;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
      }
      .course-table th {
        background: #1e40af;
        color: white;
        padding: 0.75rem 0.5rem;
        text-align: left;
        font-weight: 600;
        position: sticky;
        top: 0;
        z-index: 10;
      }
      .course-table td {
        padding: 0.5rem;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
        white-space: nowrap;
      }
      .course-table tr:nth-child(even) {
        background: #f9fafb;
      }
      .course-table tr:hover {
        background: #f3f4f6;
      }
      .first-term {
        background: #dbeafe !important;
        font-weight: 600;
      }
      .enrollment {
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: 600;
      }
      .available {
        color: #059669;
      }
      .limited {
        color: #d97706;
      }
      .full {
        color: #dc2626;
      }
